mapper.select: select * from hetolroom where roomname=#{roomname} and hotelnumber=#{hotelnumber}
select * from hotelroom where between #{price} - 10000 and #{price} + 10000
select * from hotelroom where minsize <= #{size} and #{size} <= maxsize
mapper.insert: insert into hotelroom(hotelnumber, roomname, price, minsize, maxsize, count) values(#{hotelnumber}, #{roomname}, #{price}, #{minsize}, #{maxsize}, #{count})
mapper.update: update hotelroom set hotelnumber = #{hotelnumber}, roomname = #{roomname}, price = #{price}, minsize = #{minsize}, maxsize = #{maxsize}, count = #{count} where id = #{id}
